document.full_text: the vancouver whitecaps stormed back from three goals down to earn a 3-3 draw in a thrilling encounter with sporting kansas city while david beckham set up the winner in l.a. galaxy's 1-0 win over the philadelphia union in major league soccer action this weekend.
document.title: whitecaps fight back while beckham creates winner for l.a
lines_and_colors: the vancouver whitecaps stormed back from three goals down to earn a 3-3 draw in a thrilling encounter with sporting kansas city while david beckham set up the winner in l.a. galaxy's 1-0 win over the philadelphia union in major league soccer action this weekend.
